Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CHILDREN AND FAMILIES

Title: Relates to providing supports and services for youth suffering from adverse childhood experiences
Summary: Provides supports and services for youth suffering from adverse childhood experiences.
LawCode: Add §131-aaa, Art 5 Title 12-A §370-c, amd §390, Soc Serv L; amd §305, Ed L; add §2509-b, amd §2510, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, the education law and the public health law, in relation to providing supports and services for youth suffering from adverse childhood experiences
